title: Praetor Intent Protocol
description: A formal, machine-readable contract that defines a high-level objective, its constraints, and measurable success criteria. This protocol transforms an abstract intent into a verifiable and actionable law.

objective.description: A high-level, clear, and concise description of the desired end-state. Example: 'Increase conversion in the X sales funnel.'

constraints.description: The operational boundaries and limitations within which the objective must be achieved.

max_budget_sapiens_coin.description: The maximum allocated budget in Sapiens Coin for the entire operation.

max_duration_hours.description: The maximum time in hours allowed for the mission to be completed.

forbidden_actions.description: A list of actions, strategies, or methods that are explicitly forbidden.

success_criteria.description: A set of specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART) metrics that define success.

metric_name.description: The name of the metric to be measured. Example: 'user_conversion_rate'.

target_value.description: The target value for the metric. Example: 0.15 for a 15% conversion rate.
